sources.title: Bombs Over Burma
sources.description: Early in World War II, Chungking schoolteacher Lin Yang (Anna May Wong) is recruited to help with the dangerous mission of protecting the Allied supply line from Burma into China.

sources.title: 1942 - Bombs Over Burma - Anna May Wong - They destroyed her school. She stopped their invasion
sources.description:
A schoolteacher-turned-spy must unmask a traitor before the next bomb drops on the Burma Road.
After Japanese bombers devastate her village, Lin Ying (Anna May Wong) infiltrates a suspicious convoy to expose a traitor sabotaging Allied supply routes. Trapped overnight at a remote monastery with enemy collaborators, she races to decode radio signals before dawn reveals a deadly aerial ambush.

Titles: Bombs Over Burma, Black Journey, The Devilâ€™s Sister (1942)

sources.title: Bombs Over Burma (1942) ANNA MAY WONG
sources.description:
Stars: Anna May Wong, Noel Madison, and Leslie Denison
Director: Joseph H. Lewis

Chinese girl risks her life on espionage mission against Japanese during World War II.

metadata.Plot: Early in World War II, Chungking schoolteacher Lin Yang is recruited to help with the dangerous mission of protecting the Allied supply line from Burma into China. In spite of the danger involved, her determination to help is strengthened when one of her young students is killed in a Japanese air raid. Some time later, she is part of a group of Allied representatives departing from Lashio, on a bus traveling the Burma Road back to China. A bridge outage forces them to spend the night in a monastery along the way, and during the night they watch in horror as a supply convoy of trucks is bombed by Japanese planes. The timing and accuracy of the raid brings them to realize that either one of their group, or perhaps the priest in the monastery, is really an enemy agent.
metadata.Writer: Milton Raison, Joseph H. Lewis, George Wellington Pardy
metadata.Actors: Anna May Wong, Noel Madison, Leslie Denison

relatedMovies.title: Sherlock Holmes and the Secret Weapon
